modName: realistic starting skills for mages warriors and thieves
summary: Changes your starting skills and perks to match your playstyle
descriptionHtml:
Description:This mod aims to make starting the game feel more realistic depending on the role you want to play . it edits your starting skills and perks to be more realistic of what you would expect either a mage , warrior , or thief to be able to do . 

First of the warrior file changes the following - You are given the perks armsman rank 1, barbarian rank 1, bladesman rank 1 ,deflect arrows , devastating blow ,fighting stance , shield wall and well fitted .skills i also changed to what i feel a warrior would be able to do right away . two handed 25 ,one handed 25 ,archery 10 , block 25,heavy armor 30 ,smithing 5 ,light armor 10 ,all other skills besides speech are set to 0 for a more realistic experience . I also changed starting health to 350 , magicka to 50 as i dont feel a warrior would know any magic but i left some for those who want to heal them selves , stamina is at 350 , and carryweight is up to 250

mage file includes-the perks alteration duel casting ,animage ,apprentice destruction,apprentice restoration,augmented flames rank 1,conjuration duel casting ,corpus enchanter,destruction duel casting,enchanter rank 1,magic resistance rank 1,mystic binding,novice alteration ,novice conjuration,novice destruction,novice illusion ,  novice restoration ,recovery rank 1 , regeneration , restoration duel casting , rune master , soul squeezer.    skill changes - two handed 0 , one handed 5 ,archery 0 ,block 0, heavy armor 0 ,smithing 0 ,light armor 10 , alchemy 20 ,lockpick 0 , pickpocket 0 , sneak 5 ,speech 20 ,alteration 30 , destruction 35, enchanting 25 , illusion 30 ,restoration 35 ,conjuration 30  .    health is set to 140 , magicka is at 400 , stamina 130 , carryweight 120 


Thief -Perks include Agile defender rank 1 , alchemist rank 1 ,backstab , light fingers rank 1 , merchant, muffled movement , night thief , novice locks , quick hands ,stealth rank 1 and 2 . 

skills -two handed 5 , one handed 25 , archery 25 , block 5 , heavy armor 6 , smithing 0 ,light armor 35 ,alchemy 9 , lockpick 25 , pickpocket 25 , sneak 35 ,speech 20 , all magic skills set to 0 . 

health is set to 200 . magicka 75 , stamina 200 , carryweight 240 . 



Installation: Choose which file you want to download place the txt file into your data and type in  either bat magestart , bat warriorstart , bat thiefstart in the console . 

If you have any question or ideas on how to improve this mod feel free to comment thanks !  Also feel free to check out my other mod giving good starting equipment to all 3 classes the two go good together :) http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4158
author: Legend Xz
